full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GTZUG TOR GDUGS DKAR LA BRTEN PA'I BZLOG PA NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @032A *, ,(CES GTZUG TOR GDUGS DKAR LA BRTEN PA'I ZLOG PA GRUS CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJES MDZAD PA'O, ,) 'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I @032B RAB DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,BDAG SOGS MKHA' MNYAM MAR GYUR 'GRO RNAMS KYIS, ,SGRIB GNYIS BYANG ZHING TSOGS GNYIS RAB RDZOGS STE, ,BLA MA BYANG CHEN MYUR DU THOB GYUR CIG ,MI MDZAD CHOS SBYIN CHED DU PAR BSGRUN PA'I, ,RNAM DKAR MTHU LAS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DANG, ,KHYAD PAR RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSHAD SGRUB RNAMS, ,CHES TSER DAR ZHING YUN RING GNAS PAR SHOG ,(CES PA 'DI NI HAL HA JA SAG AUS DZANG T'A CHING RTA MGRIN SKYABS KYI HO NYO NAS, DAD BRTZON DAD LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL, ,)
